pokerapp

Class Suit

  • Object
    • AbstractFormattable<Suit>
      • Suit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formattable

    public class Suit
extends AbstractFormattable<Suit>
    Describes suits (in correct order which is clubs, diamonds, hearts, spades) for pokerapp
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Steve

      • from

        public static Suit from(char c)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        When passed a character from a card representing a suit, will convert to suit or complain
        Parameters:
        c - a character representing a suit
        Returns:
        suit the character represents
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the character isn't C, D, H, S or the corresponding symbol
